function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Ineffective park closure as a response to controlling contagion.","Impact":"Increased risk of massive contagion and spread of contagious diseases.","Mitigation":"Implement effective monitoring and enforcement of safety protocols within parks, and consider alternative measures to reduce overcrowding in public spaces.","Technologies":"Surveillance technology for monitoring crowd density, contactless check-in systems, and public communication tools.","People":"General public, park visitors, and staff","Owner":"Municipal government, park management"}]}
